analysis.narrative:
ðŸ“Š **Consensus:** Market sentiment is broadly bullish (68% X, 57% RSS, 100% professional trader) but with deteriorating conviction and emerging technical warning signals. Confidence is MEDIUM - price strength masks underlying breadth weakness and sector-specific exhaustion.

ðŸ“ˆ **Themes:** (1) Mega-cap tech and financials sustaining institutional accumulation despite breadth divergence; (2) Precious metals and commodities showing exhaustion after extreme overbought conditions, signaling potential mean reversion; (3) Defensive sector rotation underway as growth/discretionary faces earnings headwinds and regulatory constraints; (4) Geopolitical and regulatory risks creating safe-haven flows and limiting upside conviction.

ðŸŽ¯ **Levels:** SPY ($690.31): Call Wall $700 (146k OI - active hedging), Put Wall $640 (153k OI - dormant). Max Pain $686. Near resistance: $730, $750 (dormant). Near support: $670 (45k OI - active). QQQ ($623.89): Call Wall $630 (33k OI - active hedging), Put Wall $590 (164k OI - dormant). Max Pain $621. Near resistance: $640 (31k OI), $625 (29k OI - both active). Near support: $585 (137k OI - dormant).
key_themes: Mega-cap tech and financials institutional accumulation
Precious metals and commodities exhaustion/mean reversion
Defensive sector rotation (utilities, real estate, healthcare)
Geopolitical and regulatory headwinds limiting upside conviction
risk_factors: Market breadth collapse (momentum stocks declining despite new highs) - classic bull trap warning
Retail conviction waning (crypto engagement collapse per Twitter: 900 posts vs. 67 likes vs. 10k+ for non-crypto)
Earnings disappointments in software, fintech, e-commerce sectors constraining near-term catalysts
Regulatory tightening (autonomous vehicles, pharmaceutical pricing, bank capital rules) limiting growth sector upside
Geopolitical tensions (Ukraine/Taiwan escalation signals) supporting safe-haven rotation away from risk assets
analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: $700 call wall acting as active resistance (146k OI). Support at $670 (45k OI - active hedging level). QQQ: $625-$630 range represents active resistance with $630 call wall. Watch for consolidation between these zones rather than decisive break.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Potential pullback toward Max Pain $686 or deeper support at $670 if $700 resistance holds. Risk of further decline toward $640 put wall if breadth deterioration accelerates. QQQ: Resistance capping at $630 call wall; break below $625 opens decline toward $590 put wall (164k OI dormant support). Silver exhaustion (per Twitter analysis: 87% above 200-day MA, extreme overbought) and deteriorating crypto engagement suggest 1-5 day consolidation or pullback as institutional support softens.

regime.label: NEUTRAL
regime.summary: Market is lacking clear direction. Wait for confirmation.

action.summary: NEUTRAL: No clear edge. Cash is a position.
